name: Culpa
description:
CULPA

A 4-bit game inspired by games like "Mother" by Irwin Segarane (go check it on Steam)

A young lady wakes up in the middle of the night to hear a strange noise coming from the kitchen. Go with her to investigate!

CONTROLS

  • E or X - INTERACT
  • ESC - CLOSE DRAWER
  • ARROWS - MOVEMENT
